articles.description: After clinching the signing of Harry Kane, Bayern Munich is switching their attention toward signing a new goalkeeper. The Bavarian club wanted to sign Kep...
articles.content: After clinching the signing of Harry Kane, Bayern Munich is switching their attention toward signing a new goalkeeper. The Bavarian club wanted to sign Kepa Arrizabalaga from Chelsea, but the Spanish… [+2930 chars]
